ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2001_01_10: Hm? You wanna talk to me?
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
Looks like you’ve tons of energy today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! If you’re
free, wanna hit the beach? I feel like going
for a swim!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Here you go! Just something nice I had.
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
Use it whenever you want! No need to get
me anything in return.
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
I wanted to give you this,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
If I find anything else that’s cool, I’ll gift it
to you!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
Here! A special present from Misty, the
Tomboyish Mermaid!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2103_02_10: If you ever need help, you can count on me!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
I’ll brush up on my skills so I can give you a
cool rescue!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Oh, right. Should we have a chat?
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I wanna hear what you have to say,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I’ve been wanting to talk to you so much,
I just couldn’t wait!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Oh! For me? Thanks! Don’t mind if I do!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
This is the best present ever! Thank you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I’ll return the favor sometime! And I’ll make
sure it’s a surprise!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2402_01_10: That was fun! Let’s talk again soon!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
It’s nice having an honest heart-to-heart.
Moments like these are essential!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Thanks! That was fun! Let’s talk again
sometime, OK?
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
Enjoying a long chat with friends you
can trust...
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
It’s almost like floating on water. It’s a
crucial form of rest!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Getting lost in your own thoughts can
be tiring.
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
In times like that, I like to move around!
If you just stay put, nothing will change!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Plus, moving your body can distract you
and lift your spirits!
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
No matter what my opponents do, I’ll find a
way to give an all-out offensive with my
Water-type Pokémon.
ch0110_01_kasumi_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
I’ll adopt all sorts of strategies—and find my
own way to evolve!
